'''1.8.1-pre4''' is the fourth pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.8.1]], released on November 6, 2014.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20141106161327/https://mojang.com/2014/10/minecraft-1-8-1-pre-release-1/|title=Minecraft 1.8.1 Pre-release 4|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* Off/fancy/fast clouds.
* Off/on entity shadows.
* Fast/fancy now only controls leaves and rain particles.

'''Performance'''
* Many optimizations.
